remarks: Define an equivalence relation on ` ZZ ` -indexed sequences of integers such that two sequences are equivalent iff the difference is equivalent to zero, and a sequence is equivalent to zero iff the sum ` sum_ k <_ n f ( k ) ( p ^ k ) ` is a multiple of ` p ^ ( n + 1 ) ` for every ` n ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
